body_part_breakdown.arms_analysis: Early elbow flare issues evolved into stable positioning, showing significant improvement in arm stability. Recent sessions demonstrate excellent elbow control and strength maintenance throughout full range of motion.
body_part_breakdown.legs_analysis: Leg stability showed marked improvement from initial hip sag. While not a primary focus, leg drive effectively supports core bracing now without breakdowns.
body_part_breakdown.core_analysis: Core progression is remarkable - evolved from severe instability (hip sag) to perfect midline bracing. Recent sessions consistently highlight core stability as foundational to success.

recommended_plan.expected_benefit: Building on recent progression history to increase load capacity while maintaining perfected form
Challenges unilateral arm stability to prevent elbow flare regression while enhancing core anti-rotation

best_workout_reason: Achieved peak score (92) through flawless execution: perfect depth maintained throughout each rep combined with rock-solid core stability and textbook tempo control under progression-level load.
